entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , White River
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:02 PM EST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -7.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Wawa Airport 12:00 AM EST Tuesday 28 February 2023
Temperature: -7.6°C
Pressure: 100.2 kPa
Humidity: 89 %
Wind Chill: -10
Dewpoint: -9.1°C
Wind: NE 5 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday night: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 9.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning early this evening. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 9. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Snow ending in the morning then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle early in the morning. Wind becoming west 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the morning. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning and minus 7 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Clearing. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: Clearing in the evening. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 9 in the evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Monday 27 February 2023
